CustomField.description: Name of the class implementing SurveyResponseValidationInterface. When accepting a question response, this class method 'validateQuestionResponse' will be invoked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To enable a customized validation for the question response, set a class name that implements SurveyResponseValidationInterface. When accepting a question response, the class method 'validateQuestionResponse' will be invoked to validate the response.
CustomField.label: Custom Validation Class Name
